import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' class CommentDetails extends Component { handleClick = (e) => { const el = e.target.closest('form') const targetEl = el.previousSibling targetEl.style.display = 'block' } render() { const { comment } = this.props return(

{comment.commentFrom} {comment.comment}

{/* */}
send
reply
) } } export default CommentDetails
